Class InvoiceStreams

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Methods that operate on groups of InvoiceStreams.

    • Method Detail

      • getCompatibleInvoiceStreams

        public static java.util.List<InvoiceStream> getCompatibleInvoiceStreams(@Nullable
                                                        InvoicePayer invoicePayer,
                                                        PaymentPlan paymentPlan)
        Parameters:
        invoicePayer - payer in question. If this is null an empty list will be returned.
        paymentPlan - payment plan to limit invoice streams with
        Returns:
        the payer's invoice streams that are compatible with the given payment plan

      • getInvoiceStreamPeriodicities

        public static java.util.List<Periodicity> getInvoiceStreamPeriodicities()
        Returns:
        the periodicities that can be used for the Periodicity field on InvoiceStream defined by the InvoiceStreamPeriodicities filter in the Periodicity typelist definition.

      • invoiceStreamFor

        public static InvoiceStream invoiceStreamFor(InvoicePayer payer,
                             Charge charge)
        Returns an Invoice Stream for the given payer according to the periodicity of the charge's payment plan. If the charge's payment plan is null, returns the default invoice stream, which is the Monthly stream.
        Parameters:
        payer - the invoice payer that owns the returned invoice stream
        charge - the charge that will have invoice items
        Returns:
        the invoice stream of the payer for the charge's invoice items

      • invoiceStreamFor

        public static InvoiceStream invoiceStreamFor(InvoicePayer payer,
                             Charge charge,
                             PaymentPlan paymentPlan)
        Returns an Invoice Stream for the given payer according to the periodicity of the given payment plan. If the payment plan is null, returns the default invoice stream, which is the Monthly stream.
        Parameters:
        payer - the invoice payer that owns the returned invoice stream
        charge - the charge that will have invoice items
        paymentPlan - the payment plan that determines the periodicity
        Returns:
        the invoice stream of the payer for the charge's invoice items for the given payment plan

      • removeTemporaryUnusedInvoiceStreams

        public static void removeTemporaryUnusedInvoiceStreams(java.util.Collection<InvoiceStream> invoiceStreams)
        This method evaluates each InvoiceStream in the supplied Collection and calls the remove() method on it if the InvoiceStream meets the following two conditions:
        1. isTemporary() returns true
        2. isEmpty() returns true
        Parameters:
        invoiceStreams - A Collection of InvoiceStreams the caller believes can be removed because they are newly created and no longer needed (should be removed and not committed).
